<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fey Fellowship](/Feats.aspx?ID=27) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 44 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your enhanced fey connection affords you a warmer reception from creatures of the [First World](/Planes.aspx?ID=10) as well as tools to foil their tricks. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to both Perception checks and saving throws against [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69).

 In addition, whenever you meet a fey creature in a social situation, you can immediately attempt a [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) check to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on that creature rather than needing to converse for 1 minute. You take a –5 penalty to the check. If you fail, you can engage in 1 minute of conversation and attempt a new check at the end of that time rather than accepting the failure or critical failure result.

**Special** If you have the [Glad-Hand](/Feats.aspx?ID=787) skill feat, you don’t take the penalty on your immediate Diplomacy check if the target is a fey.
name: Fey Fellowship
